oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On distributed computation in noisy random planar networks
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KANORIA, YASHODHAN
MANJUNATH, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: computer networks
technical presentations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: THIS PAPER IS ELIGIBLE FOR THE STUDENT PAPER AWARD. We consider distributed computation of functions of distributed data in random planar networks with noisy wireless links. We present a new algorithm for computation of the maximum value which is order optimal in the number of transmissions and computation time. We also adapt the histogram computation algorithm of Ying et al [1] to make the histogram computation time optimal.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the IEEE International Symposium on Information Theory, Nice, France, 24-29 June 2007, 626-630.
